settings.heading: Work with Us
settings.description:
L.A. GIRL Cosmetics is constantly looking for energetic and outgoing people to join our team. If you feel that you would like to be a part of L.A. GIRL USA, please email your resume to hr@lagirlusa.com.

If there is an opportunity in which your qualification meet our needs, we will contact you. We regret that we are unable to respond to all inquiries. Beauty 21 Cosmetics, Inc. is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer.
